title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, nothing happens. The expected behavior is that selecting this option should add Javadoc to the selected field. Instead, the action does nothing.
EB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, the action should add Javadoc to the selected field.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view.
2. Choose the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu.
